newsArray.title: 'Every Day is Daughter's Day': Gautam Gambhir Shares Heartfelt Tribute to His Daughters on Social Media
newsArray.description: But, there's more to life than just cricket for Gambhir, who took to social media to share a glimpse into his life as a father of two daughters, on the occasion of International Daughter's Day.

newsArray.title: 'Apna jisko, jitne run banane, dekh lo': Pant reveals Rohit's message
creator: TOI Sports Desk
newsArray.description: Rishabh Pant marked his return to Test cricket with an aggressive century, supported by Shubman Gill's unbeaten 119, setting a formidable target of 515 for Bangladesh. India's spinners R Ashwin and Ravindra Jadeja then took crucial wickets, leading to a comprehensive win by 280 runs in Chennai, giving India a 1-0 lead in the series.
